meanings.sent1: The puddle was the shallowest part of the lake.
meanings.sent2: The shallowest dish in the kitchen was the small bowl.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his knowledge of history was as shallow as a kiddie pool.
meanings.sent4: Her understanding of the topic was so shallowest that it barely scratched the surface.
meanings.sent5: The shallowest end of the pool was perfect for beginners learning to swim.

meanings.definition: Lacking depth of intellect or knowledge
meanings.sent1: The shallowest person he knew only cared about appearances.
meanings.sent2: She found the conversation to be the shallowest she had ever participated in.
meanings.sent3: His knowledge on the subject was so shallowest that it was comical.
meanings.sent4: The shallowest understanding of the concept left him confused.
meanings.sent5: The shallowest thinkers often overlook the complexities of life.
